an6.60:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
an6.60:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula thera bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta mandalamale sannisinna sannipatita abhidhammakatham kathenti.
an6.60:1.4: Tatra sudam ayasma citto hatthisariputto theranam bhikkhunam abhidhammakatham kathentanam antarantara katham opateti.
an6.60:1.5: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam cittam hatthisariputtam etadavoca:
an6.60:1.6: “mayasma citto hatthisariputto theranam bhikkhunam abhidhammakatham kathentanam antarantara katham opatesi, yava kathapariyosanam ayasma citto agametu”ti.
an6.60:1.7: Evam vutte, ayasmato cittassa hatthisariputtassa sahayaka bhikkhu ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavocum:
an6.60:1.8: “mayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam cittam hatthisariputtam apasadesi, pandito ayasma citto hatthisariputto.
an6.60:1.9: Pahoti cayasma citto hatthisariputto theranam bhikkhunam abhidhammakatham kathetun”ti.
an6.60:2.1: “Dujjanam kho etam, avuso, parassa cetopariyayam ajanantehi.
an6.60:2.2: Idhavuso, ekacco puggalo tavadeva soratasorato hoti, nivatanivato hoti, upasantupasanto hoti, yava sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim.
an6.60:2.3: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthara, vapakassati garutthaniyehi sabrahmacarihi, so samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi ranna rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi.
an6.60:2.4: Tassa samsatthassa vissatthassa pakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rago cittam anuddhamseti.
an6.60:2.5: So raganuddhamsitena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
an6.60:3.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, gono kitthado damena va baddho vaje va oruddho.
an6.60:3.2: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na danayam gono kitthado punadeva kittham otarissati’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:3.4: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, yam so gono kitthado damam va chetva vajam va bhinditva, atha punadeva kittham otareyyati.
an6.60:3.5: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo tavadeva soratasorato hoti, nivatanivato hoti, upasantupasanto hoti yava sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim.
an6.60:3.6: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthara, vapakassati garutthaniyehi sabrahmacarihi, so samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi ranna rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi.
an6.60:3.7: Tassa samsatthassa vissatthassa pakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rago cittam anuddhamseti.
an6.60:3.8: So raganuddhamsitena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
an6.60:4.1: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:4.2: So ‘labhimhi pathamassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:4.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, catumahapathe thullaphusitako devo vassanto rajam antaradhapeyya, cikkhallam patukareyya.
an6.60:4.5: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na dani amusmim catumahapathe punadeva rajo patubhavissati’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:4.7: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, yam amusmim catumahapathe manussa va atikkameyyum, gopasu va atikkameyyum, vatatapo va snehagatam pariyadiyeyya, atha punadeva rajo patubhaveyyati.
an6.60:4.8: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo vivicceva kamehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:4.9: So ‘labhimhi pathamassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:5.1: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:5.2: So ‘labhimhi dutiyassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:5.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, gamassa va nigamassa va avidure mahantam talakam.
an6.60:5.5: Tattha thullaphusitako devo vuttho sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi antaradhapeyya.
an6.60:5.6: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na dani amusmim talake punadeva sippisambuka va sakkharakathala va patubhavissanti’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:5.8: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, yam amusmim talake manussa va piveyyum, gopasu va piveyyum, vatatapo va snehagatam pariyadiyeyya, atha punadeva sippisambukapi sakkharakathalapi patubhaveyyunti.
an6.60:5.9: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:5.10: So ‘labhimhi dutiyassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:6.1: Idha panavuso, ekacco puggalo pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:6.2: So ‘labhimhi tatiyassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:6.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, purisam panitabhojanam bhuttavim abhidosikam bhojanam nacchadeyya.
an6.60:6.5: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na dani amum purisam punadeva bhojanam chadessati’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:6.7: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, amum purisam panitabhojanam bhuttavim yavassa sa oja kaye thassati tava na annam bhojanam chadessati.
an6.60:6.8: Yato ca khvassa sa oja antaradhayissati, atha punadeva tam bhojanam chadeyyati.
an6.60:6.9: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:6.10: So ‘labhimhi tatiyassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:7.1: Idha, panavuso, ekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:7.2: So ‘labhimhi catutthassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:7.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, pabbatasankhepe udakarahado nivato vigataumiko.
an6.60:7.5: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na dani amusmim udakarahade punadeva umi patubhavissati’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:7.7: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, ya puratthimaya disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi. Sa tasmim udakarahade umim janeyya. Ya pacchimaya disaya agaccheyya …pe… ya uttaraya disaya agaccheyya … ya dakkhinaya disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi. Sa tasmim udakarahade umim janeyyati.
an6.60:7.8: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:7.9: So ‘labhimhi catutthassa jhanassa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi …pe…
an6.60:8.1: Idha, panavuso, ekacco puggalo sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:8.2: So ‘labhimhi animittassa cetosamadhissa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi ranna rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi.
an6.60:8.3: Tassa samsatthassa vissatthassa pakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rago cittam anuddhamseti.
an6.60:8.4: So raganuddhamsitena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
an6.60:8.5: Seyyathapi, avuso, raja va rajamahamatto va caturanginiya senaya addhanamaggappatipanno annatarasmim vanasande ekarattim vasam upagaccheyya.
an6.60:8.6: Tatra hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena pattisaddena bheripanavasankhatinavaninnadasaddena cirikasaddo antaradhayeyya.
an6.60:8.7: Yo nu kho, avuso, evam vadeyya: ‘na dani amusmim vanasande punadeva cirikasaddo patubhavissati’ti, samma nu kho so, avuso, vadamano vadeyya”ti?
an6.60:8.9: “Thananhetam, avuso, vijjati, yam so raja va rajamahamatto va tamha vanasanda pakkameyya, atha punadeva cirikasaddo patubhaveyyati.
an6.60:8.10: Evamevam kho, avuso, idhekacco puggalo sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
an6.60:8.11: So ‘labhimhi animittassa cetosamadhissa’ti samsattho viharati bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi ranna rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi.
an6.60:8.12: Tassa samsatthassa vissatthassa pakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rago cittam anuddhamseti.
an6.60:8.13: So raganuddhamsitena cittena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati”ti.
an6.60:9.1: Atha kho ayasma citto hatthisariputto aparena samayena sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati.
an6.60:9.2: Atha kho cittassa hatthisariputtassa sahayaka bhikkhu yenayasma mahakotthiko tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavocum:
an6.60:9.3: “kim nu kho ayasmata mahakotthikena citto hatthisariputto cetasa ceto paricca vidito:
an6.60:9.4: ‘imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam citto hatthisariputto labhi, atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissati’ti;
an6.60:9.6: ‘citto, bhante, hatthisariputto imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam labhi, atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissati’”ti?
an6.60:9.8: ‘citto hatthisariputto imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam labhi, atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissati’ti.
an6.60:9.10: ‘citto, bhante, hatthisariputto imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam labhi, atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissati’”ti.
an6.60:10.1: Atha kho cittassa hatthisariputtassa sahayaka bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
an6.60:10.2: “citto, bhante, hatthisariputto imasanca imasanca viharasamapattinam labhi, atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattati”ti.
an6.60:11.1: Atha kho citto hatthisariputto nacirasseva kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbaji.
an6.60:11.2: Atha kho ayasma citto hatthisariputto eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
an6.60:11.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
an6.60:11.4: Annataro ca panayasma citto hatthisariputto arahatam ahositi.
